## CS700--Assignment_4
Github: https://github.com/ttq693/cs_700_assignment_4
Language standard: C++
IDE: CLion IDE

## Introduction

The directory contains solutions for the problems of the assignment. 

## Directory Structure

--main.cpp-- contains the main function
--shaker.h/shaker.cpp-- This module contains functions necessary to populate and fill an array with random values
  and print the results
--html--This directory contains the html documentation generated by Doxygen
--screenshot contains the screenshot of the testing
